data.text:
Law Office of Robert B. Kopelson is located in San Jose, Ca and serves clients in and around Campbell, Cupertino, Los Gatos, Milpitas, Monte Sereno, Morgan Hill, Gilroy, Santa Clara, Saratoga, San Jose, Sunnyvale, Los Altos, Mountain View, Palo Alto, Fremont, Monta Vista, San Martin, Portola Valley, Menlo Park, San Carlos, Redwood City, Hayward, Union City, San Leandro and Hollister.

Attorney Advertising. This website is designed for general information only. The information presented at this site should not be construed to be formal legal advice nor the formation of a lawyer/client relationship.
